pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:2.11: “The five month period” is the last month of the rainy season plus the four months of the cold season.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:2.14: The robe-making season ends if the Sangha decides to forgo the robe-making privilege, or if the monk leaves the monastery where he spent the rains residence and gives up any intention of making a robe before the end of the cold season, see [](pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:3.1.4) and [](pli-tv-kd7:13.2.7).
